channel.title: User Guide :: WebLogic Deploy Tooling
channel.description: User Guide The User Guide provides detailed information about installing and using WebLogic Deploy Tools. Install WDTThis section describes how to download and install WDT and what versions of Java and WebLogic Server it supports. WDT ToolsThis section covers the tools that make up WDT. Target environmentsThis section covers advanced features to target your WDT model to a specific environment.

item.title: Install WDT
item.description: This section describes how to download and install WDT and what versions of Java and WebLogic Server it supports.

item.title: WDT Tools
item.description: This section covers the tools that make up WDT.

item.title: Target environments
item.description: This section covers advanced features to target your WDT model to a specific environment.

item.title: Connect to a database
item.description: Create a connection to access your database.

item.title: Tools configuration
item.description: This section discusses advanced features to tailor your model and the behavior of WDT tools.
